text: Juha is a 1999 Finnish German French romantic comedy movie directed by Aki Kaurismäki and was the fourth adaption of the 1911 novel of the same name by Juhani Aho. It stars Sakari Kuosmanen, Kati Outinen, André Wilms, Markku Peltola, Outi Mäenpää, Esko Nikkari. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 romantic comedy movies Category:Finnish movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Aki Kaurismäki
title: Juha (1999 movie)
